Title: #118: Finding Your Greatness
Description:
Mega marketing expert Lewis Howes joins the podcast to share the tips and habits he’s gathered from interviewing “the greats.” It’s not about avoiding or neutralizing traumatic life experiences, he says. Instead, it’s applying specific habits and tools to embrace and overcome adversity. On the same path, best-selling author Whitney Johnson drops by to discuss how to go from stuck to unstuck and be successful in many unexpected ways.
